attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i wish to know why when the bank rate has been at an all time low 0.5%
the the current government take action to curb the excessive interest rate charges of the UK Credit card companies continuing to charge in excess of 18.5% 
We the tax have had to bail out these banks and will continue to do so?

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
